means: 抓住[捆住]（双臂）( pinion的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: At nine the next morning Bentley was pinioned, hooded and hanged.
sentence.Network_cn: 次日上午9点，本特里被捆住双臂、戴上头罩，然后绞死了。

sentence.Network_en: His arms were pinioned to his sides.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的双臂被绑在身体两侧。

sentence.Network_en: Pinioned by the press of men around them, they were unable to move.
sentence.Network_cn: 周围的人群挤压着他们, 使他们动弹不得.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pinion 齿轮轴轮, pinioned 有翼的, pinioned 有翅膀的
pinion 鸟翼的端部, pinioned 有翅膀的, pinion 齿轮轴轮

list.abs: 汽车配件英语词汇（三）-复合材料论坛 ... Drive line 驱动系 Drive pinion 驱动小齿轮 Drive shaft 驱动轴.
...轮转的则是三或四个一组的行星小齿轮（planet pinion），由一个旋转支架固定，行星小齿轮的外层，又和一只环形齿轮（ring gear）咬合著。环形齿轮的样子.
进出口行业词汇英语翻译(D) ... drive pinion cone bearing cup 传动小齿轮锥形轴承杯 drive pinion 传动小齿轮 drive plate 拨盘.
机械词汇的英语翻译(A-G) ... bevel gearing 锥齿轮传动装置 bevel pinion 小伞齿轮 bevel protractor 量角规.

entry.tran: （尤指通过抓住或绑住双臂）使动弹不得
entry.def: If you are pinioned, someone prevents you from moving or escaping, especially by holding or tying your arms.

example.ex: At nine the next morning Bentley was pinioned, hooded and hanged.
example.tran: 次日上午9点，本特里被捆住双臂、戴上头罩，然后绞死了。

means.word_mean: 1. (of birds) especially having the flight feathers
2. bound fast especially having the arms restrained
